# Test patterns for content filter validation
# This file contains a minimal, stable set of patterns for testing the filter mechanism.
# Production patterns are in misc/gnoweb/contentfilter-patterns.txt

DEFAULT_REPLACEMENT=[filtered]

# Basic URL pattern for testing
evil-site\.com → [blocked URL]

# Basic address patterns for testing
g1jg8mtutu9khhfwc4nxmuhcpftf0pajdhfvsqf5 → [blocked address]
g1us8428u2a5satrlxzagqqa5m6vgwu63u3s5xn8 → [blocked address]

# Keyword pattern for testing
(?i)send\s+crypto → [blocked keyword]

# Pattern without custom replacement (uses DEFAULT_REPLACEMENT)
test-spam-url\.xyz

# Pattern with special chars in replacement
phishing-word → [⚠️ blocked]

# Unicode test patterns
[\p{M}]{3,}\w+ → [zalgo]
[\u200B-\u200D\uFEFF] →
